You waved goodbye to your parents, your nose pressed against the glass.  Logan Lerman stands over you with his arms crossed watching your parents drive the car down the driveway. When they drive out of view Logan starts to talk.

"Okay squirt get to bed," he barks at you.

"Huh?" you're startled by his sharp tone. Just earlier when your parents were here he was all sweet, "I'm not tired!"

"I don't care. I have to miss a party 'cause of you so if I'm going to spend my night in here i might as well make the best of it. So get out of here!" he plops himself down on the couch and turns the tv on.

"But I wanted to be with you," you whimper as you try to get on the couch but it's too high for you.

Logan sighs as he bends forward and picks you up, setting you down beside him. You smile contentedly and lean on his side. "I wish there was some way I could take you with me without people noticing you and getting me embarrassed. And I can't just leave you here because of the tracker your parents put in you. If only you were portable."

Meanwhile 3 miles away from the house a group of scientists were together trying to figure out how to work their shrink ray. And they did it! They managed to shrink one of their own! But then the shrink ray went out of control and zapped all the scientists but one! What he did with his shrunken comrades is unknown but what is known is that a beam flew out the and headed straight for your house.

You were leaning on Logan's side when all of a sudden a beam from nowhere came and hit you! Immediately everything began growing in size!!!

"Logan!" you cry out as you stop shrinking. Logan is fixated on the tv, completely unaware to your predicament.

You get his attention and say...
1551.title: Logan Lerman

choices: You climb down to Logan's feet
15513.content: You have shrunk to 1/16th of an inch, barely visible. You stare up at Logan, an idol to you before, now a god. You've always felt a bit guilty about some of the thoughts you've had about him, but at this size, with no one likely to even notice you, let alone help you, why not indulge in these fantasies. You aren't even sure what you want to do first. You could go down to the floor, where Logan has kicked off his shoes, leaving them on their sides and wriggling the toes off his socked feet. You could climb inside his pants and even enter his boxers. You stare up at his massive form, thinking of the muscles beneath his shirt. After a long internal debate, you make your choice.
15513.title: So many choices

155131.content: You carefully climb down the couch and walk over to Logan's towering feet. His pinky toe alone is 4 times your height. You breath in the scent of his feet. You could either climb in Logan's shoe, play around on his socked foot, or climb in through a small hole in the sock.
155131.title: Logan's feet

choices: You stay outside of the sock
You get up close with Logan's toes
1551312.content: You turn away from Logan's sneaker and walk over to his socked foot. You go to a hole in the fabric. You could easily walk inside the sock and go to his toes, or you could go to his toes on the outside of his sock.
1551312.title: Other

155132.content: The daunting climb down to Logan's feet scares you a bit. Besides, you might fall. You walk over to the titanic Logan and go for his...
155132.title: Other

choices: Under his shirt, esploring his pecs and abs
1551321.content: You pull yourself up onto Logan's lap and look up at the towering young man. You grab a handful of the cloth and head for your destination.
1551321.title: Shirt

choices: His bicep, climbing over the shirt
His armpit, climbing in the shirt
15513212.title: Other

155132122.content:
You'd always had a weird fascination Logan's pit. Once he'd come to babysit you right after he'd been at the gym and didn't have time to shower. Usually when Logan babysat he'd goof off and wrestle with you. The scent of his body he'd held you down, just lying his body on top of yours to pin you down, was so masculine. He'd asked if you minded him leaving you on your own for a few minutes while he took a shower. You'd caught a glimpse of him coming out in his towel, his impressive torso wet from the water. You thought of this as you stared up at the inside of Logan's shirt, his musk permeating your nose. You began climbing, focusing on that hairy patch of skin. You finally reached it, but found yourself across from it on the corner of his t-shirt. You reached out, hoping to touch the skin, but were to far to even get a hair. You sat there for a few minutes, disappointing with your efforts, when the cloth you were on became closer. You felt the faint outline of Logan's fingers as he scratched his armpit, ensnaring you with it's hairs. Content, you took deep breaths, inhaling Logan's scent.
         Finally, when Logan had decided that you must finally be asleep in bed after all this time, Logan checks his watch seeing if he can make it to the party.
155132122.title: His armpit, climbing in the shirt

1551321222.content: Logan gets up and packs up his stuff, heading...
1551321222.title: He can't, so he goes...

choices: You are in the front of his pants
You are in the back of his pants
1551322.content: You walk over to the waistband of Logan's pants, thrilled you finally get to live out your fantasies.
1551322.title: Jeans

15513221.content: You make it into Logan's pants, pressed against his package through his boxers. You wonder whether or not you should stay here or enter Logan's boxers.
15513221.title: Unwrap the package?

15513222.content: You slip into the back of Logan's jeans, or start too, when you realize that you could easily go one layer deeper and be inside his boxers, with his massive ass. Do you?
15513222.title: You are in the back of his pants

info.brief_description: shrinking with male celebs... new Tom Welling
info.description:
The chapters might be a bit rough around the edges at first i will correct this
==========================
Like my other interactives except from the perspective of the young boy with the celeb as a childminder. I feel maybe a more personal touch is needed.
You will be armed with a set of walkie talkies one will go in the ear after a certain amount of time.
These allow me to tackle the microscopic sizes though please do remember I am putting a certain age range. This will not limit anything but the age of the star at the time of the story.
Again you are industructable in this state but begin off unaware

============
Additional
============

It will not always be the same beginning anymore

Thanks and good luck
